# Packages

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

# Data Preparation

```{r}
data("diamonds")
diamonds %>% glimpse()
```

# One Variable

## Discrete 

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(cut)) + 
  geom_bar()
```

## Continuous

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = price)) + 
  geom_density()
```

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = price)) + 
  geom_area(stat = "bin")
```

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  sample_n(100) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = table)) + 
  geom_dotplot()
```

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = price)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

# Two Variables

## Continuous X, Continous Y

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y)) + 
  geom_point()
```

## Continuous X, Discrete Y

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = price, y = clarity)) + 
  geom_bin2d()
```


## Discrete X, Continuous Y

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = clarity, y = price)) + 
  geom_jitter(alpha = .2)
```


```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = clarity, y = price)) + 
  geom_violin()
```

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = clarity, y = price)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```

## Discrete X, Discrete Y

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = clarity, y = cut)) + 
  geom_jitter(alpha = .2)
```

# Further Dimensions

## Color

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, y = y, col = price)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = .2) + 
  scale_color_continuous(low = "green", high = "red")

```

## Facets

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = x, 
             y = y, 
             col = price)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = .2) + 
  facet_grid(cut ~ color) +
  scale_color_continuous(low = "green", high = "red")
```

## Size 

```{r}
diamonds %>% 
  ggplot(data = ., 
         aes(x = x, 
             y = y, 
             col = price,
             size = table)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = .2) + 
  facet_grid(cut ~ color) +
  scale_color_continuous(low = "green", 
                         high = "red")
```
